title: FONT ID on Delias webpage font
content:
Would anyone have an idea what’s the font for these two words?

Here’s the link: [http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v600/ong\_wena/fontid.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208085252/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v600/ong_wena/fontid.jpg "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v600/ong\_wena/fontid.jpg")

1. Style  
2. Gossip

Thanks!

 [‹ Anime font ID : A weird typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208085252/http:/typophile.com/node/52389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help to id please. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208085252/http:/typophile.com/node/52388 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ongwena
